headline: Dividend Stocks To Consider In August 2025
summary: As the U.S. stock market hovers near record highs with major indexes experiencing two straight weeks of gains, investors are closely watching Federal Reserve actions and retail earnings for further direction. In this environment, dividend stocks can offer a stable income stream and potential for long-term growth, making them an attractive option for those looking to balance their portfolios amidst fluctuating interest rate expectations.

headline: 3 Top Dividend Stocks To Consider For Your Portfolio
summary: In a dynamic market environment where the Dow Jones Industrial Average has reached an all-time high while the S&P 500 and Nasdaq have experienced slight declines, investors are keenly observing potential interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve. Amidst these mixed signals, dividend stocks can offer a reliable income stream and stability, making them an attractive consideration for portfolios in times of economic uncertainty.

headline: Wall Street Lunch: Wedbush Adds CRWD, RBLX, GEV, NBIS To IVES AI 30 List
summary: Wedbush added CrowdStrike, Roblox, GE Vernova and Nebius to its IVES AI 30 list.
